text:
The Silverstreak Skycoach Rental Company, located in [[Lyrandar Tower]], operates a fleet of twenty [[skycoach]]es, five to ten of which are rented out to single parties for extended periods of time. The rest hover near the skyways and balconies in search
of people who need transportation to other areas within
the city. See [[Wards of Sharn]] for a breakdown of travel costs.

Serra Narim, a classy, red-haired human woman in her mid-thirties, started this company five years ago and still heads it today.

!! Adventure Hook

* The PCs stumble across a dead body in a less-traveled area. Investigation reveals that the corpse is that of a driver for the Silverstreak Skycoach Rental Company. Even more troubling is the fact that neither the driver nor his coach have been reported missingâ€”in fact, both are still in service.
title: Silverstreak Skycoach Rental Company
